editorialSummary.text: Modest hotel offering views of Bellary Fort, plus an outdoor pool & a vegetarian restaurant.

text.text:
Dear [Hotel Management],

I am writing to express my profound disappointment with the service provided during a reception function organized at your establishment a few months ago. Despite the prepayment for the event and the booking of rooms for our guests, the level of service and professionalism exhibited by your staff was shockingly inadequate.

During the reception, it became apparent that there was a significant shortage of desserts and snacks, despite the fact that the number of guests was nearly 100 persons fewer than expected. Upon inquiry, we were dismayed to discover that your staff had packed the desserts and distributed them to guests without seeking our acknowledgment or consent. This disregard for our arrangements and failure to communicate with us regarding such actions is completely unacceptable.

Furthermore, despite our attempts to provide feedback and address our concerns with the management, we were met with a complete lack of responsiveness. Our feedback was dismissed, and there was no effort made to rectify the situation or address our grievances in a satisfactory manner.

To compound matters, we have been subjected to persistent harassment by your receptionist, who continues to contact our guests demanding payment for dues that we have rightfully refused to settle. This persistent pursuit of payment further illustrates the lack of professionalism and accountability within your establishment.

Given the unacceptable level of service we experienced and the failure to address our concerns, we cannot, in good faith, consider paying any outstanding dues. We demand a formal apology and a comprehensive resolution to this matter. Additionally, we expect assurances that measures will be implemented to prevent similar incidents from occurring in the future.

We trust that you will take this matter seriously and respond promptly to address our concerns.

originalText.text:
Dear [Hotel Management],

I am writing to express my profound disappointment with the service provided during a reception function organized at your establishment a few months ago. Despite the prepayment for the event and the booking of rooms for our guests, the level of service and professionalism exhibited by your staff was shockingly inadequate.

During the reception, it became apparent that there was a significant shortage of desserts and snacks, despite the fact that the number of guests was nearly 100 persons fewer than expected. Upon inquiry, we were dismayed to discover that your staff had packed the desserts and distributed them to guests without seeking our acknowledgment or consent. This disregard for our arrangements and failure to communicate with us regarding such actions is completely unacceptable.

Furthermore, despite our attempts to provide feedback and address our concerns with the management, we were met with a complete lack of responsiveness. Our feedback was dismissed, and there was no effort made to rectify the situation or address our grievances in a satisfactory manner.

To compound matters, we have been subjected to persistent harassment by your receptionist, who continues to contact our guests demanding payment for dues that we have rightfully refused to settle. This persistent pursuit of payment further illustrates the lack of professionalism and accountability within your establishment.

Given the unacceptable level of service we experienced and the failure to address our concerns, we cannot, in good faith, consider paying any outstanding dues. We demand a formal apology and a comprehensive resolution to this matter. Additionally, we expect assurances that measures will be implemented to prevent similar incidents from occurring in the future.

We trust that you will take this matter seriously and respond promptly to address our concerns.

text.text: We stayed here for one day. We have booked 2 Rooms, checked in around 3.30 pm. Rooms were big and nice. AC was not working in both the rooms. Complained to the reception, after quite long time they sent some staff to attend the AC. They could rectify AC of one room and another's room they couldn't attend, we are asked to shift to to adjacent room. It was really troublesome to shift all our luggages, which were in unpacked condition. WiFi was not working inside the rooms. Room service very very bad. We ordered coffee and tea around 6.00 pm, after repeated reminders finally it was served around 7 pm. Morning complimentary breakfast was there, we went to restaurant, there was no buffet system. We were asked to wait in the lounge, since restaurant was full. Finally we got the seats. Total confusion in taking the order. What we ordered we didn't get. Food was average. Very very unpleasant experience.

originalText.text: We stayed here for one day. We have booked 2 Rooms, checked in around 3.30 pm. Rooms were big and nice. AC was not working in both the rooms. We were asked to wait in the lounge, since restaurant was full. Finally we got the seats. Total confusion in taking the order. What we ordered we didn't get. Food was average. Very very unpleasant experience.

text.text: Overall Iam giving single star as I don't find rating lesser than that. Two rooms we booked, both the rooms are big and spacious. But bathrooms and bedsheets were so dirty looks it wasn't cleaned for years. Bathrooms are smelling.  Not satisfied with the stay.

originalText.text: Overall Iam giving single star as I don't find rating lesser than that. Two rooms we booked, both the rooms are big and spacious. But bathrooms and bedsheets were so dirty looks it wasn't cleaned for years. Bathrooms are smelling.  Not satisfied with the stay.

text.text: I enjoyed my stay at Royal Fort. The best part about the hotel is its location. You will have an amazing view of Bellary Fort and most of the business and government offices are in proximity. Although, room facilities could be better, I enjoyed my food at its modest restaurant. Shushma and Shashidar made my check in and checkout process smooth. Overall a nice experience.

Shushma and Shashidar made my check in and checkout process smooth. Overall a nice experience.

text.text: It's good hotel to stay in the heart of city. Very near to the main road. Service was good. Very kind receptionist they've,they talk very politely and makes you feel comfortable. Thank you Sushma Raj(Receptionist)

editorialSummary.text: Down-to-earth rooms & suites in an unpretentious hotel offering a trio of restaurants.

text.text:
Rooms are not well maintained compared to when it started 5-6 years ago.

Specially bathrooms, they use some kind of cleaner that stinks like a pesticide.
Parking area is nit clean. Food was nit good. Room service is not up to the mark

Not worth the money what they charge.

text.text:
Rooms are very neat and hygiene. staff , service, food everything is awesome.
They provide welcome kit with shampoo, soaps , brushes, paste, comb, handiplast.
They provide complimentary breakfast which is also great taste. When we visited we had idli, Vada, sweet and khara Pongal, umpma, masala dosa, plain dosa, water melon juice , banana, coffee, tea and many more. Each and every dish was super taste. Worth staying here. Must recommended

text.text:
Our room which was initially allotted was very bad. The AC was working but was not taking commands from the remote. On complaining, at least three remotes were checked. We were asked to switch off and switch on the AC according to our needs. Finally we were allotted another room at 09.30 PM.
Breakfast was good. We didn't eat anything else so can't comment.

text.text:
Good old hotel with very little amenities.
Room furniture n curtains are old n limited.
The washroom also has very bland looks,
Damaged n clogged shower n taps.
Old commode.
Water leakages.
No Buffet breakfast included even for double AC Rooms at INR 2800 for single occupancy.
High rates.
Not worth the price.

editorialSummary.text: Humble rooms in a functional hotel with a bar, plus complimentary breakfast & Wi-Fi.

text.text: The hotel is located in the central part of the city and easily accessible. The breakfast buffet spread was average considering their charges and can be much better. The restaurant section is not up to the mark and looks more like a make shift arrangement. The overall service from check in to check out was however great along with very helpful staff.

originalText.text: The hotel is located in the central part of the city and easily accessible. The breakfast buffet spread was average considering their charges and can be much better. The restaurant section is not up to the mark and looks more like a make shift arrangement. The overall service from check in to check out was however great along with very helpful staff.

text.text:
No living facility for the driver. They charge an extra 500rs per night for driver accommodation.

In my opinion, the staff was not supportive and cooperative.

I am from pune and I hired a driver from Andhra. Since we could understand each other, the guys at reception were found making fun of us.

I had breakfast in the morning. In my opinion, it was not the best quality.

If I come to bellary again, for sure I won't prefer the Bala Residency Hotel.

There is a third class bar ( Rickshaw pullers you will find ) on the roof top, I would not recommend to go with family.

displayName.text: HOTEL ALLUM GOKULAM PARK (Please do not pay any advance for room booking)

places.shortFormattedAddress: Beside Allum Bhavan, A.D.City, by pass of, Bellary - Uravakonda - Anantapur Rd, Ballari

text.text:
I had my wedding reception at this property on 31.Jan.24, which was the best decision we made.
For a small city like Bellary, this is the only best property.

Rooms & Halls:
We had 20 rooms booked for our guests which were quite spacious and had absolutely no complaints in any which way, and the Hotel Halls were decorated and organised very well with all requirements.

Food:
We had booked all 3 meals for our guests, Breakfast, lunch and dinner. Along with evening snack.

We had about 600 guests for lunch, and about 100 guests for both breakfast and dinner.
All 3 meals were phenomenal.
The food menu was really amazing.

Overall the whole day went absolutely smooth with zero complaints.
Me and my family had all the time for us in celebrating the event rather than wasting time in organising things.
Which I believe any one would look forward to.

I have to give all the credit to the Hotel Manager Mr. Antaryami, who was extremely cooperative and friendly, and planned and organised the whole event for us.

editorialSummary.text: Simply furnished rooms, some with a/c, in a casual hotel with a modern Chinese/Indian restaurant.

text.text:
The filthiest hotel every seen. Avoid booking here, rooms are littered with cigarette ash and bed sheets are not washed atall, rooms are full of dust and spiderwebs, provided bedsheets are practically unusable. There are other better hotels nearby so don't book hear unless you want to regret.
P.S.: It would be beneficial if the owner could allocate a small fraction, let's say around 1%, of the attention given to managing online reviews towards enhancing basic cleanliness and hygiene standards in this filthy hotel. Addressing these fundamental aspects would likely contribute to a more positive guest experience rather than claiming customer is wrong. Now I am completely conviced the 3+ rating maintained in maps is due to hyper activeness of the owner towards online reviews.

text.text:
The room was clean, but we faced a few issues.
Service was slow, and we had to ask multiple times for simple things like a water bottle. At one point, the person was like can I give the bottle tomorrow, and only after insisting that we need it on the same day, did they provide us with one.

The bathroom fittings seriously need renovation. The taps were leaking , the shower was not working , and the hot water knob was not working either.

We had booked two rooms, and it was the same issue with both rooms

originalText.text:
The hotel is extremely poorly managed.The hotel seriously needs to evaluate options for improving general cleanlness and facilities.Had one of the worst experience in my life.Staff are terrible....front desk guys were worst and indifferent..i went and they have no consideration...rooms are worst quality.
In the Room ware no TV recharged and not there provide worst condition of blanket and take 1700 INR for single room.

I wanted to write more but i think it is waste of time.

text.text: Entire hotel is smelling with ciggerate smoking. In some rooms fan regulator is itself not there. For some rooms lock is not working. Dust is everywhere. Bathroom fittings are rusted. Mug and bucket is slippery. No hot water just like warm water. Never visit this hotel. Not recommended one.

originalText.text: Entire hotel is smelling with ciggerate smoking. In some rooms fan regulator is itself not there. For some rooms lock is not working. Dust is everywhere. Bathroom fittings are rusted. Mug and bucket is slippery. No hot water just like warm water. Never visit this hotel. Not recommended one.

text.text:
Worst experience with this hotel, they didn't even clean the room and washroom before our checkin.
We reached there late night with small kids so we had no option but to check in as it's just for a night stay.. Floor was dirty, blanket had holes n stinky smell was coming, had to request for a new blanket.
Please check the room before checkin.

text.text:
Worst and unprofessional staff.
Dirty bathrooms, den of Rats, guest are offered Torn bedsheets and blankets. Receptionist in a drunkard.
I don't recommend this property to anybody.
Waste of money.

originalText.text:

text.text: Such a worst experience we have called and enquired about the availability and the room price the hotel guy said us a different price at call and a different price when we visited and also they didn’t tell us that lift is not working we had been with family so there were old aged people they couldn’t climb stairs till 2nd & 3rd floor we requested them to arrange one room in ground floor and we questioned him why didn’t you people tell that lift isn’t working the hotel guy started screaming on us that it’s our mistake we should have said him that we have old ages people with us so then he would have said lift isn’t working they are so ruff and the harsh language and the way we enter to hotel they have dig the road where there is very less space to enter hotel to parking lot and there no security or any hotel staff to guide very irresponsible behaviour and useless staff I don’t recommend this stay

editorialSummary.text: Colourful, functional rooms with TVs in a modest hotel offering a restaurant/bar.

text.text: Visited just the restaurant. Clean washrooms available. Seating & Self-service restaurant offering tasty dishes. Snacks, Meals, Juices, Ice-creams available. Pan shop located outside. Ample parking space available on the backside of restaurant. Easily accessible by Main Road.

originalText.text: Visited just the restaurant. Clean washrooms available. Seating & Self-service restaurant offering tasty dishes. Snacks, Meals, Juices, Ice-creams available. Pan shop located outside. Ample parking space available on the backside of restaurant. Easily accessible by Main Road.

text.text: The rooms were neat and clean, the receptionist was also very polite and the room services were appreciable, it has two restaurants next to it. The room was well ventilated and the lift was also in good condition. I would recommend this hotel to everyone.

originalText.text: The rooms were neat and clean, the receptionist was also very polite and the room services were appreciable, it has two restaurants next to it. The room was well ventilated and the lift was also in good condition. I would recommend this hotel to everyone.

text.text: As we were hungry and running out of time, we went to this hotel for lunch. I can say in one word it was like (uppinangadi -salty). We ordered chilli Gobi, South meals, curd rice, everything was bit salty. Plus point of curd rice is that they added more dry fruits. Service is fast. Parking is a hazle as it is located on the busy road.

originalText.text: As we were hungry and running out of time, we went to this hotel for lunch. I can say in one word it was like (uppinangadi -salty). We ordered chilli Gobi, South meals, curd rice, everything was bit salty. Plus point of curd rice is that they added more dry fruits. Service is fast. Parking is a hazle as it is located on the busy road.

text.text:
I stayed at this hotel overnight during a late night stopover in Hyderabad from Sringeri and booked non-AC room. The other hotels were fully occupied
-  The hotel is satisfactory
-  Found cockroaches in the room and the lingering cigar smell. The restrooms were not properly maintained
-  Assuming AC room would be better in this hotel
